original: Andersson, Bror Gustav Wilhelm, läroverksadjunkt, Karlskrona, f. 26/12/ 06 i V. Sallerup, Malmöh. 1., av A. J. A. o. Christina Gustafsson. — Stud:ex. i Eslöv 24, fil. mag. i Lund 30, provår v. folkskisem. i Sthlm 37. Vik. adj. i Katrineholm 31, vik. ämneslär. v. Örebro h. folksk. 32, e. lär. i Ängelholm 32-36, e. o. adj. i Gävle 38-45, adj. i matem. o. kemi v. Karlskrona h. a. 1. sed. 45.
translated: Andersson, Bror Gustav Wilhelm, High School Teacher, Karlskrona, born December 26, 1906 in V. Sallerup, Malmöh. First of A.J.A and Christina Gustafsson. Completed high school in Eslöv in 1924, received a bachelor's degree from Lund University in 1930, and completed a teaching internship at a primary school in Stockholm in 1937. He worked as a substitute teacher in Katrineholm in 1931, a substitute subject teacher at Örebro's primary school in 1932, a full-time teacher in Ängelholm from 1932 to 1936, an adjunct professor of Mathematics and Chemistry in Gävle from 1938-1945, and a high school mathematics and chemistry teacher in Karlskrona since 1945.

jobTitle.name: High School Mathematics and Chemistry Teacher
